Package kchandra423.actors.weapons

Class Gun

java.lang.Object
kchandra423.actors.Actor
kchandra423.actors.weapons.Gun
public class Gun extends Actor
Represents a basic gun. Currently only fires and has spread.
Author:
Kumar Chandra

  • Constructor Details

    • Gun

      public Gun​(float x, float y)
      Creates a new gun at the specified location. Currently all other values are hardcoded
      Parameters:
      x - The x coordinate of the specified location to be created at.
      y - The y coordinate of the specified location to be created at.

  • Method Details

    • act

      public void act​(DrawingSurface d, Room r)
      Makes all the projectiles act. Removes inactive projectiles from this guns list of projectiles
      Specified by:
      act in class Actor
      Parameters:
      d - The drawing surface to be acted upon
      r - The room the actor is currently in

    • draw

      public void draw​(DrawingSurface d)
      Draws this actor, as well as all all of its projectiles
      Overrides:
      draw in class Actor
      Parameters:
      d - The drawing surface to be drawn onto

    • fire

      public void fire()
      Creates a new projectile using this images current angle. Applies all effects such as the spread, and velocity and pellets
